Our skin revitalization mitigates the effects of skin aging, and rejuvenates the skin,
restoring the elasticity and natural glow. Utilizing our 70+ laser and skin care
equipment, our skin revitalization program stimulates the deeper skin tissue to
promote collagen production, improve skin tone, leaving you looking radiant, sculpted
and an overall more youthful look.

Thermage FLX
Lifting Elasticity Improvement Wrinkle Reduction
Thermage FLX is a noninvasive skin tightening treatment,
employing energy focusing radio frequency to stimulate the
body's natural collagen production. Benefits include tighter
and smoother skin and improved skin laxity.

MD. HyunJun Park
Through his years of experience treating countless patients in the Apgujeong and C
ehongdam area, Dr. Park reached the conclusion that simple aesthetic beauty treat
ments alone were not sufficient for holistic revitalization. Based on Dr. Parks' experti
se, Maylin the Cheongdam Revitalization Center proposes a true revitalization expe
rience for both the inner body and facial aesthetics, to capture energy and preserve
youth through decelerating the aging process.

MAYLIN

Longevity is a journey that starts here

Signature Membership

The signature membership represents our holistic approach to revitalization and longevity using a combination of our
revitalization and skin revitalization. The balanced integration of our 'Revitalization Formula' and 'Skin Revitalization Formula'
focuses on providing a comprehensive anti-aging process through enhancing both physical health and aesthetic beauty utilizing
Dr Park's revitalization insights.

Message from MD. H

MAYLIN
Message from MD. Hyunjun Park
Signature Membership Revitalization Skin Revitalization Press Contact KOR / ENG

Longevity is no longer a secret. Unlock the secret of longevity.

While we cannot cease aging, we can control the speed of the process. The exponential advance in
cutting edge science has allowed us to prevent, cure, and slow down the aging process.

At Maylin the Cheongdam Revitalization Center, we have dedicated our time to unlocking the secrets
behind longevity and wellbeing, and this commitment has resulted in our comprehensive understanding
of aging and aging treatments. We strive to provide our patients with a personalized revitalization
process that is curated for the individual needs to aid patients in feeling energized and vitalized.

Inner Revitalization & Skin Revitalization

Our holistic approach to revitalization and aging prevention using a combination of our revitalization and skin revitalization

HRV Anaylsis

Stress Resistance Immune Measurement

The HRV(Heart Rate Variability) is the most proven biomarker for
evaluating the balance and healthy of the autonomic nervous system,
which is responsible for core body metabolism such as heart rate,
digestion, breathing, and sweating.
